sections.heading: Why Sponsor Us?
sections.content: Raider Racing provides a unique opportunity for companies to engage with talented engineering students who are passionate about hands-on design and fabrication. Our team members go on to work for leading companies in automotive, manufacturing, and engineering industries.

benefits.title: Brand Exposure
benefits.description: Your logo on our vehicle, and team apparel at competitions nationwide

benefits.title: Talent Pipeline
benefits.description: Direct access to skilled engineering students for internships and full-time positions

benefits.title: Social Media
benefits.description: Recognition across our social media platforms and website

benefits.title: Networking
benefits.description: Invitations to team events and facility tours

levels.name: Gold Sponsor
benefits: Featured on website and social media

sections.heading: Get Started
sections.content: Interested in sponsoring MSOE Baja Racing? We'd love to discuss how we can create a partnership that works for your organization.
